custom_nodes.author: avenstack
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AV-FunASR
custom_nodes.description: FunASR wrapper for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: burnsbert
custom_nodes.title: EBU Workflow
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for general workflow quality of life including resolutions sorted by aspect ratio, upscaling helps, and unique file names

custom_nodes.author: vladpro3
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_BishaNodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI to improve promts and image settings

custom_nodes.author: jasonjgardner
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Substance Designer Integration Plugin
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive ComfyUI plugin that enables seamless integration with Substance 3D Designer workflows through command line automation. This plugin provides custom nodes for cooking .sbs files, rendering .sbsar archives, controlling material parameters, and batch processing Substance materials within ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.author: budihartono
custom_nodes.title: CAS Aspect Ratio Presets Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Quickly create empty latents in common resolutions and aspect ratios for SD 1.5, SDXL, Flux, Chroma, and HiDream. Choose from curated presets or generate by axis and aspect ratio. Appears in the 'latent' node group.

custom_nodes.author: spawner
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-aichat
custom_nodes.description: gemini and openai in comfyui

custom_nodes.author: swhsiang
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-3d-gs-renderer
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node to support 3D GS rendering

custom_nodes.author: sLKbabawhsiang
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TuZi-Flux-Kontext
custom_nodes.description: Powerful Flux-Kontext image generation custom node for ComfyUI, using the official RabbitAI API. Supports text-to-image, image-to-image, and multi-image-to-image generation. Supports concurrent generation.

custom_nodes.author: MicheleGuidi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Computer-Vision
custom_nodes.description: Extension nodes for ComfyUI that improves automatic segmentation using bounding boxes generated by Florence 2 and segmentation from Segment Anything 2 (SAM2). Currently just an enhancement of nodes from [a/Kijai](https://github.com/kijai/ComfyUI-segment-anything-2).

custom_nodes.author: Pigidiy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LikeSpiderAI-UI
custom_nodes.description: Declarative UI Framework for ComfyUI Nodes. Minimalistic base class for creating UI-based audio/text/image nodes.

custom_nodes.author: hexxacubic
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Prompt_Library
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI Node to save and load prompts from a library.

custom_nodes.author: judian17
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-UniWorld-jd17
custom_nodes.description: Unofficial ComfyUI implementation of [a/UniWorld-V1](https://github.com/PKU-YuanGroup/UniWorld-V1).

custom_nodes.author: whmc76
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-UniversalToolkit
custom_nodes.description: This plugin provides general-purpose utility nodes for ComfyUI. Currently, it implements a 'Blank Cell Generator' node, which can batch-generate images, masks, and latents with specified resolution and color.

custom_nodes.author: xmarre
custom_nodes.title: LoRA-Safe TorchCompile
custom_nodes.description: Drop-in TorchCompile node that preserves LoRA patches.

custom_nodes.author: xiaogui8dangjia
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-imagetoSTL
custom_nodes.description: comfyui_imagetostl is a simple node for ComfyUI that converts grayscale images to STL.

custom_nodes.author: NeonLightning
custom_nodes.title: neonllama
custom_nodes.description: This custom ComfyUI node transforms a core idea into a richly detailed positive prompt using a local [a/Ollama](https://ollama.com) LLM.

custom_nodes.author: laksjdjf
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Imatrix
custom_nodes.description: This is an experimental node for generating an *imatrix* file to reduce quantization errors in GGUF files used with ComfyUI-GGUF.

custom_nodes.author: MDMAchine
custom_nodes.title: MD Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A wild collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI including noise schedulers, samplers, audio preview, latent visualizers, and more — built for maximal creative chaos.

custom_nodes.author: spawner
custom_nodes.title: CUI-Lumina2-TeaCache
custom_nodes.description: comfy extension for lumina2 TeaCache

custom_nodes.author: e-tier-newbie
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-E-Tier-TextSaver
custom_nodes.description: A node for saving cleaned text outputs, useful for LoRA training. Removes unwanted tokens like <pad> and saves to .txt.

custom_nodes.author: ARZUMATA
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ARZUMATA-PixelIt
custom_nodes.description: A python port of pixelit by giventofly.

custom_nodes.author: s9roll7
custom_nodes.title: Audio Batch
custom_nodes.description: Audio batch creation, extraction, resample, mono and stereo conversion.

custom_nodes.author: jack-liu
custom_nodes.title: Pillar_For_ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Pillar is an extension plugin for ComfyUI, providing the ability to call local distributed services for ComfyUI. Currently, it integrates the llama-joycaption-beta-one-hf-llava model and offers a distributed deployment solution to solve the problem that the model occupies too many resources and affects the image generation efficiency.

custom_nodes.author: scraed
custom_nodes.title: LanPaint
custom_nodes.description: Achieve seamless inpainting results without needing a specialized inpainting model.

custom_nodes.author: xl0
custom_nodes.title: latent-tools
custom_nodes.description: Visualize and manipulate the latent space in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: chaunceyyann
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Image Processing Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI focused on image processing operations.

custom_nodes.author: r-vage
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RvTools_v2
custom_nodes.description: this node contains a lot of small little helpers like switches, passers and selectors that i use a lot to build my workflows.

custom_nodes.author: hvppycoding
custom_nodes.title: RandomSamplerSchedulerSteps for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that randomly selects a (Sampler, Scheduler, Steps) combination from user-defined presets.

custom_nodes.author: o-l-l-i
custom_nodes.title: Olm Resolution Picker for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A smart, customizable resolution selector node with live aspect ratio preview, image overlays, and checkerboard support — cleanly parsed from a human-readable text file.

custom_nodes.author: synthetai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-JM-MiniMax-API
custom_nodes.description: A collection of ComfyUI custom nodes that integrate with MiniMax API services.

custom_nodes.author: Santodan
custom_nodes.title: Santodan Random LoRA Node
custom_nodes.description: Randomizes selected LoRAs and strengths. Includes trigger word output and support for exclusive/random selection.

custom_nodes.author: PenguinTeo
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-TextEditor-Penguin
custom_nodes.description: A text overlay node for ComfyUI that supports rich effects such as gradients, outlines, and shadows. It is suitable for adding highly customizable text content to images.

custom_nodes.author: mo230761
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Text-Translation
custom_nodes.description: This repository provides the official ComfyUI workflow for [a/Insert Anything](https://github.com/song-wensong/insert-anything).

custom_nodes.author: pictorialink
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Text-Translation
custom_nodes.description: This node uses the Translators library for translation.

custom_nodes.author: vovler
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Civitai Helper Extension
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI extension for parsing Civitai PNG workflows and automatically downloading missing models

custom_nodes.author: zccrs
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI DCI
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive ComfyUI extension for creating, previewing, and analyzing DCI (DSG Combined Icons) format files. This extension fully implements the DCI specification, supporting multi-state icons, multiple color tones, scaling factors, and advanced metadata analysis.

custom_nodes.author: s9roll7
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui CoTracker Node
custom_nodes.description: This is a node that outputs tracking results of a grid or specified points using CoTracker. It can be directly connected to the WanVideo ATI Tracks Node.

custom_nodes.author: MoonHugo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-BAGEL-Hugo
custom_nodes.description: This repository encapsulates the BAGEL model as ComfyUI nodes for use, including image editing and image inversion features, but it does not include text-to-image functionality.

custom_nodes.author: sm079
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Face-Detection
custom_nodes.description: face detection nodes for comfyui

custom_nodes.author: Aljnk
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-JNK-Tiny-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of useful custom nodes for ComfyUI - image processing, text manipulation, and workflow automation.

custom_nodes.author: sugarkwork
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_AspectRatioToSize
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that calculates width and height while maintaining aspect ratio, making it easier to determine image resolutions with specified aspect ratios and longer side values.

custom_nodes.author: AEmotionStudio
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DiscordSend
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI extension that enables seamless sharing of AI-generated images and videos directly to Discord.

custom_nodes.author: shiertier
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TeaCache-Lumina
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Node Implementation: TeaCache Acceleration Specifically Designed for the Lumina Model

custom_nodes.author: sjh00
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI LoadImageWithInfo
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node for ComfyUI that retrieves detailed information about an image, including its name, format (extension), DPI, dimensions, long side, short side, file size, and EXIF data. It also supports image saving

custom_nodes.author: violet0927
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI OmniConsistency Nodes
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI OmniConsistency Nodes is a collection of nodes for ComfyUI that allows you to load and use OmniConsistency models.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_ChatterBox
custom_nodes.description: An unofficial ComfyUI custom node integration for [a/Resemble AI's ChatterBox](https://github.com/resemble-ai/chatterbox) - a state-of-the-art open-source Text-to-Speech (TTS) model with voice cloning capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: bikiam
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_WhisperSRT
custom_nodes.description: This is custom node for audio transcribe with SRT.

custom_nodes.title: painting-by-colors-generator
custom_nodes.description: Create a painting by colors image from an image

custom_nodes.author: wildminder
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Optim
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI startup optimizer and patcher

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Image Processing Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI focused on image processing operations.

custom_nodes.author: tetsuoo-online
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-too-xmp-metadata
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI that allow you to read and write XMP metadata to images

custom_nodes.author: alessandrozonta
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PoseDirection
custom_nodes.description: This custom node for ComfyUI analyzes OpenPose keypoints to determine if a person in an image is facing forward, showing their left side, or their right side.

custom_nodes.author: avocadori
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-load-image-prompt-lora
custom_nodes.description: NODES: YAML Image Cycler (Full), YAML Image Cycler (Simple), YAML LoRA Extractor, YAML LoRA Loader, YAML LoRA Selector

custom_nodes.author: vivi-gomez
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Fix Node Translate
custom_nodes.description: Addon for ComfyUI that adds 'Fix node (recreate + keep inputs)' context menu option

custom_nodes.author: violet0927
custom_nodes.title: Hugging Face LoRA Uploader
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node to upload LoRA models to Hugging Face Hub.

custom_nodes.author: aimingfail
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LikeSpiderAI-SaveMP3
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that saves input AUDIO as .mp3 using ffmpeg.

custom_nodes.author: thalismind
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Blend Image Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This repository contains a ComfyUI node for blending images using various blending modes. Can be used to watermark images, create overlays, or apply effects to images in a ComfyUI workflow.

custom_nodes.author: boricuapab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Bori-JsonSetGetConverter
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node for ComfyUI that takes in a file path full of json's and finds the mape variable nodes in them and converts them to the kjnode set and get nodes.

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_HunyuanAvatar_Sm
custom_nodes.description: HunyuanVideo-Avatar: High-Fidelity Audio-Driven Human Animation for Multiple Characters,try it in comfyUI ,if your VRAM >24G.

custom_nodes.author: KERRY-YUAN
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Spark_TTS
custom_nodes.description: Spark-TTS controllable synthesis and voice cloning.

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ChatterboxTTS
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-ChatterboxTTS is now available in ComfyUI, Chatterbox TTS is the first production-grade open-source TTS model.

custom_nodes.author: babydjac
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Grok Prompts
custom_nodes.description: Custom ComfyUI nodes for generating prompts using Grok AI, enhancing prompt creation for text-to-image workflows.

custom_nodes.author: xhiroga
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FramePackWrapper_PlusOne
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node for FramePack, supporting 1-frame inferences.

custom_nodes.author: p1atdev
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-timm-backbone
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Timm Backbone Nodes is a custom node set that enables you to load and use pre-trained models from the [a/timm](https://github.com/huggingface/pytorch-image-models) library within ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.author: Zch6111
custom_nodes.title: AI_Text_Comfyui
custom_nodes.description: AI_Text_Comfyui is a custom node for ComfyUI that connects to the OpenAI Chat API and automatically generates creative text prompts for AI workflows. This simplified version removes external dependencies like dotenv, requiring the OpenAI key to be set using a system environment variable.

custom_nodes.author: XWAVEart
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI XWAVE Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of artistic glitch and image manipulation nodes for ComfyUI, featuring advanced noise effects, color manipulations, distortions, and more.

custom_nodes.author: wildminder
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Chatterbox
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Chatterbox TTS & Voice Conversion Node

custom_nodes.author: LingSss9
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-Merge-LoRA
custom_nodes.description: Merge up to 4 LoRA models with balanced, order-independent logic. Inspired by WebUI SuperMerger.
